When you provide here data collected from NMON you will get this data graphed.
Below is described how it works.

  1. Use your NMON data file as the input file for this form:

    0%
  2. Follow the link which will appear after processing as a starting point to your graphed data.
    Each run will be under independent location, this assure privacy of graphed data.
  3. If you get an error then snap the screenshot and send it to support@lpar2rrd.com
  4. Uploaded files and web pages created by this application are regularly removed from the web server.
    If you want to keep it then save it as web page (complete).
